title: Battle Bunny Riven's Q must get attention!!!
body:
There is a bug on Battle Bunny Riven's Q which makes her Q sound not work.. I'd expect Riot to have already fix this because this bug has been happening since her chroma pack update. There are also many other people who have posted this bug, Riot I'm dissapointed that you still have not fixed this with all the small updates you've been doing..

THIS NEEDS TO GET ATTENTION

replies.body: You're correct that this is an issue that was introduced with the Battle Runny Riven chroma packs. We have a fix ready to roll, and you should see it once patch 6.20 goes live shortly! ^-^
